resources.string: This application is just a product of university project about android development with Kotlin developed by Sekou Samassa. He is a student in software engineering in Russian Federation where has lived since November 2019.
This product is a freeware. You can\'t find the source in GitHub https://github.com/sksamassa/Dice-Roller. Though, we would be good if you mention our name.
I\'m playing Dice. It is amazing !!!!
In each round it adds the score result with the previous. The point of the game is if the score reaches 36 without overcoming it. The player wins the game. If he overcomes 36, he loses it.
